flawed_nl_solution:
Jake weighs 8kg more than 52 kg which is 8+52 = <<8+52=60>>60 kg
Tracy and Jake together weigh 60+52 = <<60+52=112>>112kg
John therefore weighs 158-112 = <<158-112=46>>46 kg
The range of their weights is 60-46 = <<60-46=41>>41kg
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
